chapters.title: Chapter 48: Near Avendesora
chapters.info: Raven Empress, p. 719—Name used by the Aiel for the Seanchan Empress during Aviendha's steps through the crystal columns of Rhuidean the second time through. Once the Last Battle was over, she started a war to attempt to conquer the rest of the world—and she seems to be winning. See also Empress (of Seanchan), The; Paendrag, Fortuona Athaem Devi.
